code: @Test public void testLanguage() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "<foo>Hello World</foo>").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("language:xpath:/foo/text()").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
